headline: Hormel Foods Appoints Donald Monk as Company's First Chief Technology Officer
summary: Hormel Foods Corporation (NYSE: HRL), a Fortune 500 global branded food company, today announced the appointment of Donald Monk as chief technology officer, effective March 23. In this newly created role, Monk will serve as the company's senior-most technology leader, responsible for envisioning, aligning and delivering the enterprise technology, digital and data strategy that supports long‑term growth.

headline: 4 Meat Stocks to Monitor Amid a Volatile and Uncertain Market
summary: TSN, HRL, SFD and BYND are navigating cost and export pressures with diversified portfolios, strong brands and steady protein demand.

headline: Hormel Foods (HRL) Refocuses on Branded Foods: Portfolio Simplification or Constraint on Future Flexibility?
summary: Earlier in February 2026, Hormel Foods issued first-quarter fiscal 2026 guidance calling for about US$3.00 billion in net sales, implying 2% organic growth over the prior year and diluted earnings per share of US$0.33. At the same time, Hormel moved to streamline its portfolio by exiting its whole-bird turkey business and confirmed its focus on branded foods and long-term growth targets. Now we’ll explore how Hormel’s whole-bird turkey divestiture and reaffirmed growth outlook influence the...

headline: Hormel Foods Gears Up for Q1 Earnings: Key Insights for Investors
summary: HRL's first-quarter results are likely to show modest sales growth, but elevated beef costs and turkey constraints may pressure earnings.

raw.headline: Hormel Foods Gears Up for Q1 Earnings: Key Insights for Investors

headline: How The Hormel Foods (HRL) Story Is Evolving As Analyst Targets And Guidance Shift
summary: Hormel Foods’ analyst price target has been nudged from US$27.25 to US$27.00, a small 0.9% trim that still keeps the fair value marker close to prior views. Research commentary around the move points to a more fine tuned stance on Hormel’s execution and growth profile, rather than any broad change in sentiment. As you read on, you will see how this updated target fits into the wider analyst narrative and what to watch if you want to stay on top of how the story evolves. Analyst Price Targets...
